page.title: 15 ORDNANCE SURVEY ERRORS?
page.content: ORDNANCE SURVEY maps are greatly admired for their accuracy.So it was with some surprise that we found any ERRORS on our section of the 1:50000 map.They have many uses and tell us much about the LANDSCAPE,but errors and omissions do occur, sometimes through changes since surveying. In Cothill there is a Nature Reserve opened by BBONT(Berks.,Bucks and Oxfordshire Naturalist Trust) not marked on at 467998.Yet the map appears to be up to date in its OMISSION of the public house which closed two years ago.Also in Cothill the public telephone kiosk (T) is not marked. The private school, dating back to the 1870's is not marked either. In square 4398 the (T) and Inn are on the wrong sides of the road. (First Series map used).
